gr.kzps.id2212.project.client

Class AgentItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • gr.kzps.id2212.project.client.AgentItem

  • public class AgentItem
extends java.lang.Object
    Representation of an agent stored in the client. It stores the UUID of the agent, the status, the provided query, the result set and the visited servers.
    Author:
    Antonis Kouzoupis
